Field Detail

_DelayTimeWaitingThreads

public static final int _DelayTimeWaitingThreads
Delay time for waiting for other threads inside a thread... This is in milliseconds.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

_DefHistoryCapacity

public static final int _DefHistoryCapacity
Default history capacity. Because we need to check duplicates before showing history list, this value should be small.

See Also:
